cause.description:
For far too long have these "cute" sea dwellers gotten away with murder. Every year, thousands of dollars are spent cutting up perfectly good fishing net to get these bastards lose. Thousands of dollars are spent paying off staff to hide the fact that the captain enjoys a little Dolphin on his toast in the morning.
Well no more. The main argument for keeping these bastards alive is that they're so smart. Well, if they're so smart then why do they keep getting caught in fishing nets ?
I personally love dolphins. I really really do. Just a little salt and some mayonaise with a hint of garlic and you've got an incredible meal.
And some dolphin jokes =============== Q: What is the difference between a dolphin and filthy whore? A: It is understandable for a dolphin to smell and taste like fish
Q: What is the difference between fucking a dolphin and fucking a fat chick? A: A dolphin will not stain your sheets with Cheetos powder.
Q: What is the difference between a female dolphin and a retarded girl? A: I have never had sex with a female dolphin.
Q: Why do dolphins say eeek eeek eeek? A: Because if they said that all Mexicans are lazy they would be racist.
Q: How do you stop a dolphin from having a baby? A: A wire hanger.
1. Ensure 100% tuna free dolphin chunks
2. Rid the seas of these aquatic terrorists
3. Create a new reliable and healthy food source
cause.name: Bugger the dolphin
